column1: "description": "The Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA) is India\u2019s main programme for universalization of elementary education (UEE). Its overall goals include universal access and retention
column2: bridging of gender and social gaps in enrolment levels and enhancement of learning levels of all children. SSA\u2019s activities ..."
